query: CREATE TABLE test_tablesample (id int, name text) WITH (fillfactor=10)
expected: CREATE TABLE test_tablesample (id INT, name TEXT) WITH (fillfactor = 10)

query: INSERT INTO test_tablesample SELECT i, repeat(i::text, 200) FROM generate_series(0, 9) s(i)
expected: INSERT INTO test_tablesample SELECT i, repeat(CAST(i AS TEXT), 200) FROM generate_series(0, 9) AS s(i)

query: SELECT t.id FROM test_tablesample AS t TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (50) REPEATABLE (0)
expected: SELECT t.id FROM test_tablesample AS t TABLESAMPLE system (50) REPEATABLE (0)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (100.0/11) REPEATABLE (0)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (100.0 / 11) REPEATABLE (0)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (50) REPEATABLE (0)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (50) REPEATABLE (0)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (50) REPEATABLE (0)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (50) REPEATABLE (0)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (5.5) REPEATABLE (0)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (5.5) REPEATABLE (0)

query: SELECT count(*) FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (100)
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (100)

query: SELECT count(*) FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (100) REPEATABLE (1+2)
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (100) REPEATABLE (1 + 2)

query: SELECT count(*) FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (100) REPEATABLE (0.4)
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (100) REPEATABLE (0.4)

query: CREATE VIEW test_tablesample_v1 AS SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (10*2) REPEATABLE (2)
expected: CREATE VIEW test_tablesample_v1 AS SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (10 * 2) REPEATABLE (2)

query: CREATE VIEW test_tablesample_v2 AS SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (99)
expected: CREATE VIEW test_tablesample_v2 AS SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (99)

query: DECLARE tablesample_cur SCROLL CURSOR FOR SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (50) REPEATABLE (0)
expected: DECLARE tablesample_cur SCROLL CURSOR FOR SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (50) REPEATABLE (0)

query: FETCH FIRST FROM tablesample_cur
FETCH NEXT FROM tablesample_cur
expected: FETCH FROM tablesample_cur

query: CLOSE tablesample_cur
END
expected: COMMIT

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (50) REPEATABLE (2)
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (50) REPEATABLE (2)

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM test_tablesample_v1
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM test_tablesample_v1

query: explain (costs off) select count(*) from person tablesample bernoulli (100)
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM person TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (100)

query: select count(*) from person tablesample bernoulli (100)
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM person TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (100)

query: select count(*) from person
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM person

query: SELECT count(*) FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (('1'::text < '0'::text)::int)
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (CAST((CAST('1' AS TEXT) < CAST('0' AS TEXT)) AS INT))

query: select * from (values (0),(100)) v(pct), lateral (select count(*) from tenk1 tablesample bernoulli (pct)) ss
expected: SELECT * FROM (VALUES (0), (100)) AS v(pct), LATERAL (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tenk1 TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (pct)) AS ss

query: select * from (values (0),(100)) v(pct), lateral (select count(*) from tenk1 tablesample system (pct)) ss
expected: SELECT * FROM (VALUES (0), (100)) AS v(pct), LATERAL (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tenk1 TABLESAMPLE system (pct)) AS ss

query: explain (costs off) select pct, count(unique1) from (values (0),(100)) v(pct), lateral (select * from tenk1 tablesample bernoulli (pct)) ss group by pct
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT pct, COUNT(unique1) FROM (VALUES (0), (100)) AS v(pct), LATERAL (SELECT * FROM tenk1 TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (pct)) AS ss GROUP BY pct

query: select pct, count(unique1) from (values (0),(100)) v(pct), lateral (select * from tenk1 tablesample bernoulli (pct)) ss group by pct
expected: SELECT pct, COUNT(unique1) FROM (VALUES (0), (100)) AS v(pct), LATERAL (SELECT * FROM tenk1 TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (pct)) AS ss GROUP BY pct

query: select pct, count(unique1) from (values (0),(100)) v(pct), lateral (select * from tenk1 tablesample system (pct)) ss group by pct
expected: SELECT pct, COUNT(unique1) FROM (VALUES (0), (100)) AS v(pct), LATERAL (SELECT * FROM tenk1 TABLESAMPLE system (pct)) AS ss GROUP BY pct

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE FOOBAR (1)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE foobar (1)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (NULL)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (NULL)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (50) REPEATABLE (NULL)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (50) REPEATABLE (NULL)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (-1)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (-1)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (200)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (200)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (-1)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (-1)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM (200)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample TABLESAMPLE system (200)

query: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample_v1 TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (1)
expected: SELECT id FROM test_tablesample_v1 TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (1)

query: INSERT INTO test_tablesample_v1 VALUES(1)
expected: INSERT INTO test_tablesample_v1 VALUES (1)

query: WITH query_select AS (SELECT * FROM test_tablesample) SELECT * FROM query_select TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (5.5) REPEATABLE (1)
expected: WITH query_select AS (SELECT * FROM test_tablesample) SELECT * FROM query_select TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (5.5) REPEATABLE (1)

query: SELECT q.* FROM (SELECT * FROM test_tablesample) as q TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (5)
error: parse error at position 65: syntax error

query: create table parted_sample (a int) partition by list (a)
expected: CREATE TABLE parted_sample (a INT) PARTITION BY list (a)

query: create table parted_sample_1 partition of parted_sample for values in (1)
expected: CREATE TABLE parted_sample_1 PARTITION OF parted_sample FOR VALUES IN (1)

query: create table parted_sample_2 partition of parted_sample for values in (2)
expected: CREATE TABLE parted_sample_2 PARTITION OF parted_sample FOR VALUES IN (2)

query: explain (costs off) select * from parted_sample tablesample bernoulli (100)
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM parted_sample TABLESAMPLE bernoulli (100)

query: drop table parted_sample, parted_sample_1, parted_sample_2
expected: DROP TABLE parted_sample, parted_sample_1, parted_sample_2
